progress.email_template_version: updated pitch (automated assistant, booked appointments, premium tier)

notes: Fixed parser, filtered main dealer pages, started scraping missing main pages. Next: Brave search enrichment for dealer websites and email extraction.

First real outreach batch sent successfully. Zoho SMTP operational. Cron job scheduled for daily outreach. Continuing scraping and enrichment for remaining dealers.
